CHANGES
-------

1.0.1 (2007-09-26)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

- Fixed meta-data.

1.0.0 (2007-09-26)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

- First public release.

0.2.1
~~~~~

- Added the ``--web`` option to ``coveragediff``.
- Added a test suite.

0.2.0
~~~~~

- Added ``coveragediff.py``.

0.1.0
~~~~~

- Initial release of ``coveragereport.py``.
